import React from 'react' const toaster = ({Position,Title,Message}) => { const success =({Position,Title,Message})=>{ return(

{Title}

{Message}

) } const danger =({Position,Title,Message,backgroundColor= '#5cb85c'})=>{ return(

{Title}

{Message}

) } const info =({Position,Title,Message})=>{ return(

{Title}

{Message}

) } const warning =({Position,Title,Message})=>{ return(

{Title}

{Message}

) } } export default toaster
